entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as someone who couldn't bear being in debt to Harry's father and worked hard to protect Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who tries to understand Professor Snape's behavior and asks questions about getting the Stone out of the Mirror.

entities.name: stone
entities.description: The Stone is mentioned as something that only one person can get from the Mirror without using it.

entities.name: mirror
entities.description: The Mirror is where the Stone is kept and can be retrieved by someone who wants to find it but not use it.

entities.name: elixer of life
entities.description: Elixir of Life is mentioned as something that people might see themselves doing if they try to get the Stone for personal gain.

relationships.description: Professor Snape worked hard to protect Harry this year because he felt it would make him and Harry's father quits.
Harry can get the Stone out of the Mirror because only one person who wants to find the Stone but not use it can do so.
